## hpr2029 :: The DSO138 Oscilloscope Kit

 In this episode NYbill talks about building a DSO138 Oscilloscope kit.

A note about counterfeits:
https://www.jyetech.com/Products/LcdScope/e138.php
The kit with pre-soldered SMD parts:
https://tinyurl.com/j7sr9zy
Without pre-soldered parts:
https://tinyurl.com/hxp3bz3
The forums:
https://tinyurl.com/htq3tne
Pics for the episode:
https://media.gunmonkeynet.net/u/nybill/collection/the-dso138-oscilloscope-kit/
